description: The hype is real. The Hype Down Hoody is essential mountain gear that you can wear and take anywhere when temps are dipping or plunging below freezing. Extremely packable and extremely warm with hydrophobic ExpeDRY™ technology, this 800-fill-power-down puffer offers quick-drying, breathable performance that easily stuffs into your backcountry or commuting pack when it's time to shed layers in the car, hut, or office lobby. 100% Recycled Pertex® Quantum fabric gives you extra an extra layer of durability for long-lasting protection when layered under a shell in the thick of the backcountry or thawing out by the firepit when the day is winding down and the aprés is warming up.
name: Marmot Hype Down Jacket - Mens
